function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of reaction mix due to incorrect handling or storage of reagents.","Impact":"False positive results leading to inaccurate diagnostic conclusions.","Mitigation":"Implement strict handling and storage protocols for reagents, perform regular quality control checks.","Technologies":"Refrigeration, temperature monitoring systems, sterile work environments.","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, quality control teams."},{"Description":"Use of outdated or expired reagents in the reaction mix.","Impact":"Reduced sensitivity and specificity of the PCR test, leading to inaccurate results.","Mitigation":"Regularly check and update reagent expiration dates, perform quality control checks on reagents.","Technologies":"Barcode scanning systems, inventory management software, quality control assays.","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, quality control teams."},{"Description":"Improper disposal of contaminated materials after the RT-PCR assay.","Impact":"Risk of spreading infectious materials and potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2 RNA.","Mitigation":"Implement proper disposal procedures for contaminated materials, use biohazard waste containers.","Technologies":"Biohazard waste disposal systems, autoclaves, contamination control protocols.","People":"Laboratory technicians, waste management personnel, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Laboratory managers, waste management teams."}]}
